attributes.action: police dating agencies and ensure the safety of the growing number of lonely heart columns and web sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are they safe ? Please don't reject my petition on the grounds that it is out of the PM's remit - if law and order is not part of govt, what is ? Look at the opportunities for prostitution and crime within the new medias.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
